Class Platform

  • java.lang.Object
    • Thing
      • Platform

  • public class Platform
extends Thing
    The Thing the user must jump on with a colour specified in the Game.
    Version:
    1.0 May 23, 2012
    Author:
    Peng Chen, Branson Lee
